title: Ep 74: Stronger Than Yesterday with Jackie Johnson
itunes:title: Ep 74: Stronger Than Yesterday with Jackie Johnson
itunes:subtitle: How do you care for yourself during a divorce? This week, Jackie Johnson, host of the Natch Beaut podcast, joins Kate in the guest host spot, and details all the self-care practices she's implemented in the wake of her marriage ending. From swimmi...
description:
How do you care for yourself during a divorce? This week, Jackie Johnson, host of the Natch Beaut podcast, joins Kate in the guest host spot, and details all the self-care practices she's implemented in the wake of her marriage ending. From swimming with sharks, to meditation, to indulging in body lotion, Jackie shares how she's making herself a priority, connecting with her emotions, and living a more present life. Plus, she recommends her favorite natural beauty products of the moment. And yes, there are some f-bombs, tears, and most importantly: a cameo by Chooch the dog!

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group( password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • Rothy’s - Get free shipping and free returns and exchanges when you visit rothys.com/forever35.
  • Legacybox - Visit legacybox.com/forever35 for 40% off.
